content: original japanese name きのこ kinoko english name mushrooms pattern is entirely in japanese but charted no gauge is listed in the pattern calls for japanese size 8/0 5 0mm hook you will need approximately 20g 30 meters of color a and 15g 22 5 meters of color b also available here 1 pdf https //clover co jp/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/recipe_amigurumi05aki pdf 1 http //www clover co jp/kyan/knit/amigurumi shtml
